title: Amazon DynamoDB Stream to AWS Lambda
description: This CDK application demonstrates how to establish an Amazon DynamoDB table stream, an AWS Lambda function, and the minimal IAM permission needed for the application to function properly.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The CDK stack creates an Amazon DynamoDB with AWS Lambda function.

When items are inserted or updated in a DynamoDB table, the changes are sent to a stream. This pattern configures a Lambda function to poll this stream. The function is invoked with a payload containing the contents of the table item that changed.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
